runs.comm: bowled'im, first ball, swinging in towards middle and off and Kamran has a massive swing at it, misses it completely and the stumps take a beating! The crowd erupts, just the start they wanted
starts well, lands on a good length on the off and comes in just a touch, defended solidly towards cover
short and wide, comes down the track and cuts it down towards third man to open Pakistan's account
moving back in sharply, coming in from the off stump towards middle, rocks back and works it in front of square for a single to get off the mark
appeared to hold its line this time, driving length just outside off, tried to ram it back past the bowler, got an inside edge onto his pads
mistimes it, short of a good length, just a hint of inward movement, charges down the track to flay it through the covers, hits the bottom of the bat and gets to the fielder on the bounce
not here, overpitched on middle and Nazir is tempted, picks it up beautifully, carting it over mid-on for a couple of bounces over the ropes

dropped, Malinga the culprit, surprised him with a short one there which Nazir mistimed, gets a top edge and it sails towards mid-on, Malinga just has to run a few steps back to snap that one but messes it up completely, how costly will that prove?
some sense restored, back of a length on middle, rocks back and defends it watchfully towards extra cover
what an entertaining then balls we've had so far, short and wide, Malik slaps that disdainfully over the bowler's head, wide of mid-off, for a boundary
the ferocious slap followed by some subtle touches, short outside leg stump, stands tall and whips it stylishly to beat fine leg to the ropes
three in a row, Thushara's been hammered, length ball on middle, Malik gives him the charge and lofts it straight over his head for a one bounce four
Nazir follows Malik's lead, it's overpitched outside off, he dances down the track and smashes him over extra cover, four consecutive boundaries
fullish on middle and leg, swings hard at it, attempts to clear midwicket, gets a thick inside edge through square, couple more to the total
held back the length this time, short on the off stump, comes down the track to heave it over midwicket, misses and is struck high on the thighs, gets a leg bye
lands on a good length outside off, moves across to crack it through the leg side, gets an inside edge onto his pads and rolls down behind point
nicely done, in the blockhole this time, just a fraction outside off, Nazir got his bat down just in time to dig it out wide of cover
bowled on a length just outside off, drags it down towards mid-on, a fumble allows them to rush through for an easy single
swinging it away from the right hander, Nazir makes room to and swings hard to clear extra cover but makes no contact

oooh, just evades first slip, fuller, charges down the track to smack him over mid-off, gets a thick outside edge as it moves away and it flies past the outstretched hands of the slip fielder to the boundary
banged in short on middle, goes for the pull, bowled at a fierce pace, there was a sound but Sangakkara fumbled it, was it a drop? We need replays
lands on a good length outside off, makes room to clatter him over cover, doesn't quite get hold of it, gets a lot of elevation and it lands safe, Jayasuriya gives chase but they've taken three

Malik was dancing around the crease even before Malinga hurled it down, shuffled across and then moved away, Malinga bowled it short on the off and Malik, trying to pull it past midwicket, was caught off-guard as it kept a little low, missed it and it went straight onto the stumps, two down!
is welcomed with the bouncer, banged in hard on middle, Afridi ducks and is caught on the shoulder, that should ruffle him a bit, how will he respond?
Nazir has a swing again, gets an inside edge to beat short fine, a couple of runs

shot, short and just a little wide, was slower through the air, waited for it and cut it hard past point for a boundary, a more guarded stroke compared to some he attempted earlier but executed brilliantly
shortish outside off, makes room to heave it over midwicket but made no contact
Kulasekara sees him charging down and hurls it in the blockhole, Nazir just about manages to dig it out in the end, adjusted well to the length
memories of his exploits for Lahore Badshahs in the ICL, short and wide, comes down the track and thwacks it with a wild swing miles over midwicket for a massive six
sensible stuff, keeps the  strike by pushing it wide of midwicket for a quick single

appeal for caught behind, the short one by Malinga catches Nazir by surprise, came onto him really quickly, went for the pull, got a thin edge straight to the keeper, there's a huge appeal but the umpire is unmoved, wrong call
short and wide, makes room to cut that hard over point but it's too quick, no contact made
excellent pace, bowled at 142.7 kmph, bouncer outside off, goes for the hook but again, it zips past the swing of the bat
excellent fielding at midwicket, short again and this time he manages to connect the pull but didn't time it all too well, Udawatte dives full length to his right to keep them down to just a single
changing his pace, slower one bowled short outside off, Afridi has nothing to do with it, quite unusually leaves it be
fishes for it this time, short again, tries to work it down to third man but isn't able to meet it, good over from Malinga
fullish on middle, Nazir bends low and sweeps it really fine, wide of short fine for a boundary, off the middle
held its line, pulled back the length and bowled it short outside off, opened the face to play it wide of point for a single
flatter on middle, moves across and taps it back towards the bowler

appeal for lbw, spun back in sharply from a good length outside off, Afridi failed to read it well, missed it and was rapped on the pads in line with middle and off, given a run when it was nowhere near the bat, an extremely close call, Asoka de Silva the man in the hot seat
down the leg side, fired it hard, Nazir lets it go and earns a wide
on middle and leg, comes forward and punches it back to the bowler
Afridi opens up this time, didn't time it well much to his own relief as his attempt to clear deep extra cover fell just short of the fielder, just a single
low full toss outside off, chips it over extra cover for a single in the deep
short one, bowled at 137.6 kmph, too quick for Afridi who fails to connect an attempted pull
pitched on a length on middle, driven from the crease to mid-on for a single

gone! Malinga makes up for lapse earlier in the innings, in the slot outside off, makes room and swings hard in an attempt to clear long-off, gets more elevation than distance and it lands safely in the palms of Malinga in the deep, big blow, an entertaining innings comes to an end
back of a length just outside off, punched down to deep cover for a single
starts off with a slower offcutter, moved back in from a good length outside off, run down to third man for a single
Akmal off the mark in solid fashion, pushes it firmly back past the bowler towards long-off for a single, presented the full face

short of a length just outside off, chopped down behind point for a single, a throw at the non-striker's end catches Afridi on the back and they try to take another run on the deflection but decide against it
pushed into the off side on the back foot for a quick single
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it watchfully towards the bowler
short of a length outside off, cut away off the back foot wide of deep point for a couple of runs
slightly short on middle and leg, pushed gently into the vacant gap wide of mid-on and they have enough time to make it back for the second
two more, full on middle, closes the face and gets the ball into the same gap for a couple more, working it nicely is the youngster
turned sharply from outside leg towards middle, got back and punched it firmly in the direction of deep midwicket for a single
gave it some air but it landed full on middle and leg, dug out back to the bowler
big heave, tried to bend low and clear square leg, pitched outside leg, slightly short and caught him on the pads, they get a leg bye

picked the length quickly there, hurled in short on middle, rocked back and pulled it away powerfully over midwicket to beat the gap between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary, had picked his spot
length ball outside off, drilled back past the bowler towards long-off for a single
just a fraction outside off, eased through the off side towards deep cover for one more

Six! For quite some time it seemed that long-on was in a good position to pouch it but it just cleared him, not there to the pitch but a mighty swing from the powerful man, got a lot of elevation and long-on would have been tempted but in the end he had no chance
full outside off, steered down to third man for a single
shot! Full and wide, makes room and slices it hard over point for four more, poor delivery, there's a massive gap between third man and deep point and he bisects it perfectly
slower one bowled short outside off, chopped into the deep for a single to keep the strike
short of a length outside off, waited for it to turn in and caned it towards deep cover for a single
tossed up outside leg stump, Afridi gets into position early and sweeps it down towards long leg for a single
turned in sharply from a good length outside off, tapped into the leg side for a quick single
swept again, tried to make room but Murali was targeting leg, shuffled across and played it down to long leg for one more
short on the off stump, made room to cut it towards deep point for a single, too close to cut one would think but Akmal had no problems playing it
fullish outside off, Afridi dances down and smacks it down to long-on, just the one run
starts with a rubbish delivery, full toss on leg stump, picked up easily behind square for a boundary, brings up the 100
low full toss on middle, thumped down to long-on, calls for the second but Umar Akma sends him back in time
appeal for lbw, full and wide, makes room to drive that hard to extra cover, misses, there is a sound and the keeper goes up, perhaps the bat hitting the ground, Asoka probably got it right there
shot! Slower one bowled full outside off, waited for it, picked his spot and flayed it between long-off and deep cover for four more, expensive comeback for Thushara
slower one again, cut away as Akmal tried to nudge it down to third man, dot ball
poor delivery, full on leg stump, meaty length ball, flicked away elegantly wide of short fine leg for a boundary, they're piling it on, brings up the 50-stand
flighted outside off, driven down to long-on for a single
short on the off stump, makes room to slap that to extra cover,Afridi calls for a single and is sent back in time, the dive saves him
short again, makes room to hammer that to deep cover for a single
four more, Afridi does it beautifully, flighted outside off, charges down the track and crashes it over extra cover for a boundary
another one, saw him coming down and hurled it wide, reached for it and smacked it again in the same region, huge gap between deep cover and long-off
keeps the strike, bowled short on leg stump, paddled down fine for a single
bowled full outside off, makes room to drive, gets an under-edge, it bounces over the keeper, they get two more
down the leg side, not too much, Afridi walks across to scoop it over short fine, doesn't connect, not called a wide
low full toss on the off stump, clubbed to Murali at long-on who returns a sharp throw to keep them down to one
full toss again, outside off, thumped down the ground to long-off for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, dragged down to long-on for a single

gone! An unusual dismissal, low full toss outside off, Akmal attempts the scoop but is a little too early into the shot, gets a top edge and Sanga just has to run back a couple of steps to take a simple catch
shortish on the off, pushed wide of extra cover for a single
back of a length on middle, Razzaq rocks back and defends it to extra cover
slightly short outside off, moves away and eases it down to deep cover for a single
saw him make room and hurled it short well outside off, there was no way the batsman could have reached it, called a wide
delicately done, Afridi showing his subtle side, short outside off, waited for it and opened the face at the last moment to guide it past the keeper and third man for a boundary
picked this one beautifully, overpitched on middle and just a flick of the wrists, timed it superbly to clear wide long-on, on 49 now
yorker outside off, dug out just wide of cover for a single, gets his half-century, his third in a row in Twenty20's, remember his exploits the semis and the final of the World Twenty20
slower one, a full toss outside off, makes room to smash that past cover, misses

gone this time, the low full toss does the trick. Afridi got into a good position to execute his attempt to clear long-off but didn't time it all too well, straight to Kulasekara who takes it comfortably
full and wide, Razzak makes room and steers that to point, no run there
another full toss, makes room to place it just wide of point for a single
walked across first up, the bowler chased him and hurled it wide of the off stump, guided down to third man for a single
saw him make room, pushed it wide, tapped down to deep cover for a single, just three off the over
Murali tosses it up outside leg stump, swept down to long leg for a single
straying down leg, swept down wide of short fine for a single
on middle and leg, closes the face to work it wide of square leg for a single
flighted just outside leg stump and his eyes lit up, went for the big one, attempting to clear long-on, missed it, and Sangakkara failed to pouch it, three more to the total
on leg stump, swept away down towards long leg for a couple more
fired it really quick outside off, tapped just short of extra cover for a single
in the slot outside off, length delivery, makes room and chips it over extra cover for a couple
doling out length balls here, full and wide, smacked wide of deep cover and the fielder there, Jayawardene, makes a complete mess of it as he overruns the ball and concedes a boundary
poor delivery, low full toss on middle, has no trouble swinging it away over midwicket for a boundary

well fielded by Jayawardene in the deep, overpitched outside off, smashed over extra cover, Jayawardene runs yards to his left from deep cover and drags it just back in, diving full length to his right, to keep them down to two
full toss outside off, thwacked down to Jayawardene again but just for a single
full and wide, makes room to crash it past point, gets a thick outside edge down to third man for a single
lands on a good length on middle, driven hard down to long-on for a single
nicely timed, had picked his spot, full and wide, made room and chipped it firmly over extra cover, four more to the score
slower one, deceived him there, bowled at 122.3 kmph, Razzak was too early into the heave, missed it completely
another slower one, this one's bowled at 123.3 kmph, Razzaq is into the pull a little too early, misses, and it goes just over the stumps, Sanga fumbles and allows them a single
swing and a miss, slower one bowled at 119.8 kmph, Malinga's recovered well after conceding that boundary, Misbah tries to clear midwicket but it cuts away from it, another dot ball

Jayawardene drops it, slower one bowled short outside off, heaved away straight to Jayawardene at deep square leg, he bends low and gets it into good position to pouch it but is unable to hold on, the batsmen just squeeze a single
